title: OCE Skin
body:
Hey Riot :)

Just wondering if you have any updates on the oce skin? Or a timeframe in which we can expect a hint or a little information on it?

 Thanks heaps!

replies.body: I hate to tell you but it's never coming...Although if it does, I really hope it's a Gumtree Maokai skin that throws drop bears, consumes bush tucker as passive and has gumnuts float around him for ulti.
Based on the state of most things we were supposed to have for this server I'd say its never coming.

Its never coming. 

3 years minimum i bet .
no that was a temp one to say sry for the delay

I thought the OCE skin was Pool Party Ziggs.
At least, that's what was given to players on server release. Btw, you can't get it for free anymore :(
